Plot: After a 25-year absense from society where Karl Childers (Billy Bob Thornton) was raised he is suddenly released from a mental ward after being commited for a double homicide of his mother and her boyfriend. His psychiatrist is convinced if Karl is released he may once again live a "normal" life despite his problem with mental illness. The people of the small town have mixed emotions about Karl living amoungst them again.
